title: Ban a champ (Ranked) - Not able to click Ban button
body:
This is starting to get on my nerves, I've had my fair share of 20 min queue waits due to apparent "failure to choose a champ", simply because my client doesn't respond - all while my internet is working perfectly.

Now, after logging in for the first time today, I get into a ranked game. It's my turn to ban a champ.

I click ZED, a black border is highlighted around ZED's portrait - however, the BAN button doesn't highlight.

I click on other champs, the same thing - border highlighted, but BAN button doesn't highlight.

This game has so many bugs it's frustrating, especially for someone like myself who can only play 1 game every few days.

I received a 30 min queue ban because I apparently "abandoned a game during champion selection" which is F*kn Bull*hit.

Does anyone from Riot look into issues like this, or do you  not give a flaming hoot?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try the following and let me know if anything helps.

* [Repair your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)
* [Reset Windows internet options](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-#wq3)
* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944#wq111)
